document.full_text: over two million people will contract a form of tuberculosis (tb) resistant to standard drugs by 2015 and the fight against it must be stepped up, the world health organization said on wednesday.
document.title: drug-resistant tb to afflict 2 million by 2015: who
lines_and_colors: over two million people will contract a form of tuberculosis (tb) resistant to standard drugs by 2015 and the fight against it must be stepped up, the world health organization said on wednesday.
